description: Numbers n such that 88^n - 87^n is prime or a strong pseudoprime.
comments: All terms must be prime. - _M. F. Hasler_, Sep 21 2013a(7) > 10^5. - _Robert Price, May 28 2015
author: _Mike Oakes_, May 18 2001, May 19 2001
extensions: a(6) from _Robert Price_, May 28 2015 (computer run by Adam Marciniec)
